text: “I have not failed. I’ve just discovered 10,000 approaches that won’t be successful.”
“The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.”

“I was the biggest failure I knew. I stopped pretending to myself that I was anything other than I was, and began to direct all my energy into finishing the only work that mattered to me. Had I really succeeded at anything else, I might never have found the determination to succeed in the one arena where I felt I truly belonged.“
